item.title: Leetcode 956 Tallest Billboard
item.description: Problem Description You are installing a billboard and want it to have the largest height. The billboard will have two steel supports, one on each side. Each steel support must be an equal height. You have a collection of rods which can be welded together. For example, if you have rods of lengths 1, 2, and 3, you can weld them together to make a support of length 6.
